translations: 目录；所含物，容纳的东西
使满意，使满足（content 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: The contents of the report were leaked to the press.
sentences.translation: 报告的内容泄露到新闻界了。

sentences.sentence: Baxter paraphrased the contents of the press release.
sentences.translation: 巴克斯特解释了新闻发布的内容。

sentences.sentence: There is no Table of Contents.
